mapper.insert: insert into serviceinfo( sIndex, scId, smId, sprId, speId, sType, sWork, sMemo, sInDate, sInTime, sEndTime, sEndDate, sServTime, sFileName) values(serviceinfo_seq.nextval,#{scId},#{smId},#{sprId},#{speId},#{sType},#{sWork},#{sMemo},#{sInDate},#{sInTime},#{sEndTime},#{sEndDate},#{sServTime},#{sFileName})
mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo where scid = #{scId} order by sInDate
